description:
Poetic Lily`s Inspiring Shop: Chevy and her friends one day encountered Lily, a Pomegranate flavored rabbit Zooble and decided to hide until they`re covet is blown. The trio always finds her weird as she always speaks in rhyme and always does poems, causing the others to get annoyed. But Lily always wants to join the group and play with them, as they accept. But everytime they play, Lily always does a strange poem and one time, causing the three to feel weird while she`s around. But when Lily is in trouble, Chevy and the others decides to save her, even if how annoying she is.
What Day is it Today!: Maron is again admiring herself in the mirror one day as she remembered a party in Coron`s place due to her birthday. Later on, everyone is enjoying the cake Coron made as Maron again is getting jealous. After the party, Coron received a letter from Maron about her birthday party and consulted to Chevy and Panky about it as they both agreed. Coron is getting jealous as well as Maron`s plan worked. The three talked about it later on and Coron decide to host a revenge party to make Maron jealous. Maron does the same as well as both Zoobles were engaged in an all out party combat against each other. As the competition heats up, the group decided to consult Kumampa for advice.

titles.title: Poetic Lily`s Inspiring Shop / What Day is it Today!
Shijin no Lily wa Kangekiya-san / Kyou wa Nan no Hi!
詩人のリリーは感激屋さん / 今日はなんの日!
